price: (42) The cause is only against the ones who wrong the people and tyrannize upon the earth without right. Those will have a painful punishment.
arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلسَّبِيلُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَظۡلِمُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ وَيَبۡغُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innamā al-sabīlu ʿalā alladhīna yaẓlimūna al-nāsa wayabghūna fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi ulāika lahum ʿadhābun alīmun
